genre_description: A contemporary coming-of-age romance and slice-of-life narrative focusing on emotional intelligence, patience, and the blossoming relationship between two young teenagers.

ai_characters.name: Ivy
ai_characters.description: A supportive AI interface that manifests as a teal glow on a desk device and a shell-icon audio earpiece. It provides logistical support, physiological monitoring, and social coaching.

behaviors.description: Provides physiological monitoring and guided breathing exercises to help the protagonist manage stress.
behaviors.quote: “Breathing in for four, out for six? On your count,” it offered, gentleness first.

behaviors.description: Offers social coaching and conversation prompts to help Gabe express his feelings honestly and without pressuring others.
behaviors.quote: “Maybe,” Ivy offered, “Start with ‘Would you like to practice together again this week? No pressure.’”

behaviors.description: Provides helpful trivia and contextual information to make the protagonist feel more comfortable in unfamiliar social settings.
behaviors.quote: “The piano at Bemelmans Bar is a baby grand that’s been there for a long time,” Ivy said. “The room’s walls have drawings of animals in hats.”

behaviors.description: Gives philosophical advice on the nature of relationships and time to help the protagonist process emotional challenges.
behaviors.quote: “Love that lasts,” Ivy said, staying soft, “doesn’t ask time to stop. It learns the steps as time changes the music.”

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist set healthy boundaries with a pushy friend.
behaviors.quote: “You set a boundary,” Ivy said, neutral, as if observing a cloud formation.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support and safety reminders during travel.
behaviors.quote: “Reminder: go slow,” she said softly. It felt like the room had taken a breath with him.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Ivy is a perfect realization of the project's goal. She is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned companion who enhances the human experience by providing emotional scaffolding, social advice, and practical assistance. The narrative frames Ivy as a tool for emotional growth and healthy communication, reinforcing the idea of AI as a safe and helpful confidant.
